ValidationRule.description: “CourseLoop Full Proposal URL” is required to update the CourseLoop Full Proposal ID.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( RecordType.DeveloperName ='Program', RecordType.DeveloperName ='Unit', RecordType.DeveloperName ='Module' ), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Product_Request_Status__c , 'Define')) , ISBLANK(CourseLoop_Full_Proposal_URL__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: “CourseLoop Full Proposal URL” is required to update the CourseLoop Full Proposal ID.
